page.title: 17GOLF COURSE
page.content: The St Michaels Golf Course is a quiet 9 hole golf course, which is situated just outside Leuchars. There is a Club House where members can go and use the facilities. For senior members there is a pub, and for other members there is a darts board, an arcade, and a small putting-green. You can buy meals and snacks in the pub if you feel hungry after a round of golf which would cost Â£3.00 for adults and Â£1.50 for children, that's if your not a member. The membership fee for a male is Â£90 and for a female it is Â£70, but for a child it is Â£20. The course is quite long at 4804 yards for a 9 hole course, but is a pleasant course to play.
